alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 09 at 10:47AM PST until December 10 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of the Umpqua Valley, as well as portions of higher terrain above 1500 feet in Douglas Josephine, and Curry Counties. This includes portions of Interstate 5 including at Sexton Pass, Canyon Creek Pass and in Douglas County. This also includes the Tiller Trail Highway, and portions of Highway 42 at Camas Mountain and Highway 138. This also includes a portion of Highway 199 near the Collier Tunnel. This also includes the communities of Sutherlin, Winchester, and Drain. * WHEN...From 1 PM today to 4 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills
